suite.doc: This example demonstrates executing commands on a remote machine and getting their output and the return code. http://robotframework.org/SSHLibrary/SSHLibrary.html#Read Notice how connections are handled as part of the suite setup and teardown. This saves some time when executing several test cases.
suite.status: Suite teardown failed: User keyword 'Shutdown Application And Close All Connections' contains no keywords.

suite.doc: This example demonstrates executing commands on a remote machine and getting their output and the return code. http://robotframework.org/SSHLibrary/SSHLibrary.html#Read Notice how connections are handled as part of the suite setup and teardown. This saves some time when executing several test cases.
